OVERVIEW

Adult Lives and Visions Empowered (ALIVE) is a ministry targeting the young adults and professionals in River of God Church. In ALIVE, the young adults and professionals find a platform to engage, learn, share and encourage each other spiritually,socially, and economically. ALIVE Ministry is the next step once a member graduates from Broken Jars ministry.

MINISTRY OBJECTIVES

  1. To be a platform in which young adults engage, learn and share
  2. To be an avenue for personal and spiritual development
  3. To harness and optimize the synergy available based on the skills, abilities and talents of members
  4. To equip members with the tools to safely navigate through the challenges of singlehood and settle down in working enjoyable marriages
  5. To be a ready pool of youthful, energetic resource at the Church’s disposal

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
